# EnZIM UI Component Specifications

**Copyright (C) 2025 Robin L. M. Cheung, MBA. All rights reserved.**

*Derived from UI-Samples prototypes generated by WEBuiLD*

---

## 1. Design System Overview

EnZIM supports **4 primary theme variants** with distinct visual languages:

| Theme | Mode | Aesthetic | Primary Accent |
|-------|------|-----------|----------------|
| **Synaptic Cartography Veil** | Dark | Neon, glassmorphic, neural network | `#00f0ff` (Cyan) |
| **Brutalist Archive Monolith** | Light | Bold, print-like, utilitarian | `#ff4d00` (Orange) |
| **Prismatic Swiss Utility** | Light | Clean Swiss design, multi-color | `#00f0ff` / `#ff00aa` / `#ffdd00` |
| **Spectral ZIM Reader** | Dark | Sci-fi, spectral glows, filament | `#00f2ff` (Cyan) |

---

## 2. CSS Design Tokens

### 2.1 Synaptic Cartography Veil

```css
:root {
    /* Background */
    --void-bg: #030407;
    --void-depth: #0a0b14;
    
    /* Accent Colors */
    --synapse-cyan: #00f0ff;
    --synapse-blue: #2d6cdf;
    --memory-magenta: #bd00ff;
    --data-gold: #ffd700;
    
    /* Glass Surfaces */
    --glass-surface: rgba(15, 20, 30, 0.45);
    --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
    --glass-highlight: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
    
    /* Text */
    --text-main: #e0e6ed;
    --text-muted: #8a93a0;
    
    /* Typography */
    --font-ui: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    --font-code: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
    
    /* Animation */
    --ease-out-expo: cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
}
```

### 2.2 Brutalist Archive Monolith

```css
:root {
    /* Background */
    --bg-concrete: #e6e6e6;
    --bg-paper: #f4f4f0;
    
    /* Colors */
    --ink-black: #0a0a0a;
    --accent-orange: #ff4d00;
    --accent-blue: #0033ff;
    --grid-line: #ccc;
    
    /* Typography */
    --mono-font: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
    --sans-font: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
    
    /* Borders & Shadows */
    --border-thick: 3px solid var(--ink-black);
    --border-thin: 1px solid var(--ink-black);
    --shadow-hard: 6px 6px 0px var(--ink-black);
    --shadow-hover: 2px 2px 0px var(--ink-black);
}
```

### 2.3 Prismatic Swiss Utility

```css
:root {
    /* Prismatic Accents */
    --prism-1: #00f0ff;  /* Cyan */
    --prism-2: #ff00aa;  /* Magenta */
    --prism-3: #ffdd00;  /* Yellow */
    
    /* Background */
    --bg-color: #f7f7f9;
    --surface-color: #ffffff;
    
    /* Text */
    --text-main: #0a0a0a;
    --text-muted: #666666;
    --border-color: #e5e5e5;
    
    /* Typography */
    font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    --font-mono: 'Space Mono', monospace;
    --font-display: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
}
```

### 2.4 Spectral ZIM Reader

```css
:root {
    /* Background */
    --bg-void: #030407;
    
    /* Filament Colors */
    --filament-cyan: #00f2ff;
    --filament-pink: #ff00e1;
    --filament-amber: #ffaa00;
    
    /* Glass Surfaces */
    --glass-surface: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
    --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
    
    /* Text */
    --text-primary: #e0e6ed;
    --text-secondary: #94a3b8;
    
    /* Typography */
    --font-main: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    --font-data: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
    
    /* Animation */
    --transition-smooth: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);
}
```

## 3. Layout Structure

### 3.1 Main Application Grid

All themes share a **3-column layout** structure:

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                         HEADER (64px)                            │
│  [Logo/Brand]     [Search Bar]     [Status/Actions]             │
├──────────────┬────────────────────────┬─────────────────────────┤
│              │                        │                         │
│   SIDEBAR    │      MAIN CONTENT      │    SEMANTIC MESH        │
│   (260-280px)│      (flexible)        │    (320-380px)          │
│              │                        │                         │
│  - Archives  │  - LibraryView         │  - Graph Visualization  │
│  - Bookmarks │  - ReaderView          │  - Related Nodes        │
│  - History   │  - SearchView          │  - See Also List        │
│              │                        │                         │
└──────────────┴────────────────────────┴─────────────────────────┘
```

**CSS Grid Definition:**

```css
/* Synaptic */
.interface-layer {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr 380px;
    grid-template-rows: 60px 1fr;
    gap: 16px;
}

/* Brutalist */
main {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr;
}

/* Prismatic Swiss */
.grid-swiss {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 260px 1fr 340px;
    height: 100vh;
}

/* Spectral */
body {
    display: flex;
}
aside { width: 72px; }  /* Compact icon sidebar */
.mesh-sidebar { width: 320px; }
```

---

## 4. Component Specifications

### 4.1 Header Component

**Structure:**

```html
<header class="glass-panel header">
    <!-- Brand -->
    <div class="brand">
        <svg><!-- Logo icon --></svg>
        <span>AnZimmerman</span>
        <span class="version">v0.9.2</span>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Search Bar -->
    <div class="search-bar">
        <svg class="search-icon"><!-- Search icon --></svg>
        <input type="text" placeholder="Search..." />
    </div>
    
    <!-- Status/Actions -->
    <div class="system-status">
        <div class="status-indicator">
            <div class="dot active"></div>
            <span>INDEX ONLINE</span>
        </div>
    </div>
</header>
```

**Theme Variants:**

| Theme | Height | Background | Search Style |
|-------|--------|------------|--------------|
| Synaptic | 60px | Glass blur (24px) | Pill, dark bg |
| Brutalist | 80px | Solid paper | None, minimal |
| Prismatic | 64px | White/blur | Rounded, border |
| Spectral | 64px | Transparent/blur | Pill, glowing |

### 4.2 Sidebar / Library Panel

**Structure:**

```html
<aside class="glass-panel sidebar">
    <!-- Section: Archives -->
    <div class="section-title">
        <span>Archives</span>
        <svg><!-- Plus icon --></svg>
    </div>
    
    <div class="zim-list">
        <div class="zim-card active">
            <div class="zim-title">Wikipedia English</div>
            <div class="zim-meta">
                <span>all_nopic_2023</span>
                <span class="size-badge">98 GB</span>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- More cards... -->
    </div>
    
    <!-- Section: Bookmarks -->
    <div class="section-title">Bookmarks</div>
    <div class="bookmark-list">
        <div class="bookmark-item">
            <svg><!-- Bookmark icon --></svg>
            <span>Article Title</span>
        </div>
    </div>
</aside>
```

**Active State Indicators:**

| Theme | Active Style |
|-------|--------------|
| Synaptic | Left border glow (`box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--synapse-blue)`) |
| Brutalist | Arrow prefix `►` + bold text |
| Prismatic | Left border + subtle shadow |
| Spectral | Left filament bar with glow |

### 4.3 ZIM Archive Card

**Structure (Brutalist - most detailed):**

```html
<article class="zim-card">
    <div class="card-header">
        <span>ID: WIKI_EN_ALL</span>
        <span>ZIM 2.0</span>
    </div>
    <div class="card-body">
        <div class="zim-icon">W</div>
        <h2 class="zim-title">Wikipedia English</h2>
        <p class="zim-desc">The complete encyclopedia...</p>
        <div class="mesh-indicator">NODES: 6.4M</div>
    </div>
    <div class="card-footer">
        <div class="meta-tags">
            <span class="meta-tag">98.4 GB</span>
            <span class="meta-tag">OCT 2023</span>
        </div>
        <button class="action-btn">MOUNT DRIVE</button>
    </div>
</article>
```

**Hover Effects:**

| Theme | Hover Behavior |
|-------|----------------|
| Synaptic | Border glow, bg lighten |
| Brutalist | Translate (4px, 4px), shadow collapse |
| Prismatic | Left border accent, subtle lift |
| Spectral | Border glow cyan, scale(1.02) |

### 4.4 Reader / Article View

**Structure:**

```html
<article class="reader-panel">
    <!-- Article Header -->
    <div class="article-header">
        <div class="breadcrumb">Physics / Quantum Mechanics</div>
        <h1 class="article-title">Quantum mechanics</h1>
        <div class="article-actions">
            <button class="action-btn primary">Expand</button>
            <button class="action-btn">Save</button>
            <button class="action-btn">Share</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <!-- Article Content -->
    <div class="article-content">
        <p><strong>Quantum mechanics</strong> is...</p>
        <h2>History</h2>
        <p>Classical physics...</p>
        
        <!-- Wiki Links -->
        <a href="#" class="wiki-link">quantum physics</a>
        
        <!-- Code/Math Block -->
        <div class="code-block">
            $$ i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t} \Psi = \hat{H} \Psi $$
        </div>
    </div>
</article>
```

**Typography:**

| Element | Synaptic | Brutalist | Prismatic | Spectral |
|---------|----------|-----------|-----------|----------|
| Title | 1.5rem / 800 | 4rem / 300-700 | 5rem / bold | 48px / 300 |
| Body | 0.95rem / 1.6 | 0.9rem / 1.4 | 17px / 1.8 | 17px / 1.8 |
| Links | Cyan dotted | Blue underline | Cyan underline | Cyan bottom border |

### 4.5 Semantic Mesh View

**Structure:**

```html
<main class="mesh-viewport">
    <!-- SVG Connection Lines -->
    <svg class="svg-connections">
        <line x1="50%" y1="50%" x2="20%" y2="30%" class="connection-line active"></line>
        <!-- More lines... -->
    </svg>
    
    <!-- Node Cluster -->
    <div class="node-cluster">
        <!-- Center Focus Node -->
        <div class="semantic-node focus" style="top: 50%; left: 50%;">
            <svg class="node-icon"><!-- Globe icon --></svg>
            Quantum mechanics
        </div>
        
        <!-- Related Nodes -->
        <div class="semantic-node secondary" style="top: 30%; left: 20%;">
            Wave-particle duality
        </div>
        <!-- More nodes... -->
    </div>
    
    <!-- HUD Overlay -->
    <div class="hud-overlay">
        ZOOM: 100% | NODES: 5 VISIBLE
    </div>
    
    <!-- Controls -->
    <div class="mesh-controls">
        <button>Zoom In</button>
        <button>Zoom Out</button>
        <button>Fullscreen</button>
    </div>
</main>
```

**Node Styles:**

| Theme | Node Shape | Focus Style | Edge Style |
|-------|------------|-------------|------------|
| Synaptic | Pill (20px radius) | Cyan glow, larger | SVG lines, gradient |
| Brutalist | N/A (list view) | N/A | N/A |
| Prismatic | Circle (50%) | Border black, shadow | SVG gradient lines |
| Spectral | Card list | Cyan dot indicator | N/A (list) |

### 4.6 Search Bar

**Structure:**

```html
<div class="search-bar">
    <svg class="search-icon"><!-- Search icon --></svg>
    <input type="text" 
           class="search-input" 
           placeholder="Query Neural Mesh..." 
           value="">
    <span class="shortcut">⌘K</span>
</div>
```

**Styles:**

| Theme | Shape | Focus State |
|-------|-------|-------------|
| Synaptic | Pill (100px radius) | Cyan border, glow shadow |
| Brutalist | None (inline) | N/A |
| Prismatic | Rounded (md) | Cyan ring + border |
| Spectral | Pill (18px radius) | Cyan border, glow |

### 4.7 Action Buttons

**Variants:**

```html
<!-- Primary -->
<button class="action-btn primary">
    <svg><!-- Icon --></svg>
    Expand
</button>

<!-- Secondary -->
<button class="action-btn">
    <svg><!-- Icon --></svg>
    Save
</button>

<!-- Icon Only -->
<button class="action-btn icon-only">
    <svg><!-- Share icon --></svg>
</button>
```

**Styles by Theme:**

| Theme | Primary | Secondary | Hover |
|-------|---------|-----------|-------|
| Synaptic | Cyan border/text | Muted border | Glow effect |
| Brutalist | Orange fill, white text | Black border | Invert colors |
| Prismatic | Subtle bg | Border only | Lift + color |
| Spectral | Filament border | Glass bg | Glow + transform |

---

## 5. Animation Patterns

### 5.1 Common Animations

```css
/* Pulse (Status Indicator) */
@keyframes pulse {
    0% { opacity: 0.5; }
    50% { opacity: 1; }
    100% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

/* Float (Mesh Nodes) */
@keyframes float {
    0% { transform: translateY(0px); }
    50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
    100% { transform: translateY(0px); }
}

/* Shimmer (Loading Skeleton) */
@keyframes shimmer {
    100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
}

/* Filament Pulse (Spectral) */
@keyframes filament-pulse {
    0% { opacity: 0.3; }
    50% { opacity: 0.8; }
    100% { opacity: 0.3; }
}
```

### 5.2 Transition Curves

```css
/* Synaptic */
--ease-out-expo: cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);

/* Brutalist */
transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1);

/* Spectral */
--transition-smooth: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);
```

---

## 6. Responsive Breakpoints

```css
/* Mobile First Approach */

/* Tablet (768px) */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    main { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
    aside { display: none; }
    .mesh-sidebar { display: none; }
    .view-title { font-size: 2.5rem; }
}

/* Large Desktop (1440px+) */
@media (min-width: 1440px) {
    .article-view { padding: 64px 15%; }
}
```

---

## 7. Icon Library

All prototypes use **inline SVG icons** with consistent sizing:

| Context | Size | Stroke Width |
|---------|------|--------------|
| Navigation | 20px | 1.5-2 |
| Action buttons | 14-16px | 2 |
| Status indicators | 14px | 2 |
| Large decorative | 24px | 1.5 |

**Recommended:** Use **Lucide Icons** (referenced in Prismatic) for consistency.

---

## 8. Background Effects

### 8.1 Synaptic - Animated Particle Mesh

```javascript
// Canvas-based particle system
class Particle {
    constructor() {
        this.x = Math.random() * width;
        this.y = Math.random() * height;
        this.vx = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.3;
        this.vy = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.3;
        this.size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
    }
    // Draw connections when dist < 150px
}
```

### 8.2 Brutalist - Grid Pattern

```css
body {
    background-image: 
        linear-gradient(var(--grid-line) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, var(--grid-line) 1px, transparent 1px);
    background-size: 40px 40px;
}
```

### 8.3 Spectral - Mouse-Following Refraction

```javascript
document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
    overlay.style.background = `
        radial-gradient(circle at ${e.clientX}px ${e.clientY}px, 
                        rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.04) 0%, transparent 40%),
        radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, 
                        rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.01) 0%, transparent 50%)
    `;
});
```

---

## 9. Accessibility Considerations

### 9.1 Color Contrast

| Theme | Text/Background | Minimum Ratio |
|-------|-----------------|---------------|
| Synaptic | `#e0e6ed` on `#030407` | 14.5:1 ✓ |
| Brutalist | `#0a0a0a` on `#f4f4f0` | 16.7:1 ✓ |
| Prismatic | `#0a0a0a` on `#ffffff` | 21:1 ✓ |
| Spectral | `#e0e6ed` on `#030407` | 14.5:1 ✓ |

### 9.2 Focus States

All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators:

```css
/* Example focus style */
button:focus-visible {
    outline: 2px solid var(--accent-color);
    outline-offset: 2px;
}
```

## 10. Implementation Notes

### 10.1 React Component Structure

```
src/
├── components/
│   ├── layout/
│   │   ├── Header.tsx
│   │   ├── Sidebar.tsx
│   │   └── MainContent.tsx
│   ├── library/
│   │   ├── LibraryView.tsx
│   │   └── ZimCard.tsx
│   ├── reader/
│   │   ├── ReaderView.tsx
│   │   ├── ArticleHeader.tsx
│   │   └── ArticleContent.tsx
│   ├── mesh/
│   │   ├── MeshView.tsx
│   │   ├── SemanticNode.tsx
│   │   └── ConnectionLines.tsx
│   ├── search/
│   │   ├── SearchBar.tsx
│   │   └── SearchResults.tsx
│   └── common/
│       ├── Button.tsx
│       ├── Input.tsx
│       └── StatusIndicator.tsx
├── themes/
│   ├── synaptic.css
│   ├── brutalist.css
│   ├── prismatic.css
│   └── spectral.css
└── hooks/
    └── useTheme.ts
```

### 10.2 Tailwind Configuration

```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
    theme: {
        extend: {
            colors: {
                // Use CSS variables for dynamic theming
                'bg': 'var(--bg-color)',
                'surface': 'var(--surface-color)',
                'accent': 'var(--accent-color)',
                'text-main': 'var(--text-main)',
                'text-muted': 'var(--text-muted)',
            },
            fontFamily: {
                'ui': ['Inter', 'sans-serif'],
                'mono': ['JetBrains Mono', 'monospace'],
                'display': ['Space Grotesk', 'sans-serif'],
            },
        },
    },
};
```

## 11. User Auth & Billing UI (Future Placeholder)

> **Note:** These components are placeholders for future implementation of user authentication and subscription management.

### 11.1 Auth UI Components

```
src/
├── components/
│   └── auth/
│       ├── LoginModal.tsx          # Email/password + OAuth buttons
│       ├── SignupModal.tsx         # Registration flow
│       ├── ForgotPasswordModal.tsx # Password reset
│       ├── UserAvatar.tsx          # Header user icon/dropdown
│       ├── ProfileMenu.tsx         # User profile dropdown
│       └── AuthGuard.tsx           # Route protection wrapper
```

### 11.2 Billing UI Components

```
src/
├── components/
│   └── billing/
│       ├── SubscriptionCard.tsx    # Current plan display
│       ├── PricingTable.tsx        # Plan comparison
│       ├── UpgradeModal.tsx        # Upgrade flow
│       ├── PaymentMethodForm.tsx   # Stripe Elements
│       ├── InvoiceHistory.tsx      # Past invoices
│       └── FeatureGate.tsx         # Conditional feature wrapper
```

### 11.3 Header Integration

The `UserAvatar` component slots into the Header's right section:

```html
<header class="glass-panel header">
    <div class="brand">...</div>
    <div class="search-bar">...</div>
    <div class="header-actions">
        <div class="status-indicator">...</div>
        
        <!-- Future: User Auth Section -->
        <div class="user-section">
            <!-- Logged Out State -->
            <button class="action-btn">Sign In</button>
            
            <!-- Logged In State -->
            <div class="user-avatar">
                <img src="avatar.jpg" alt="User" />
                <span class="plan-badge">PRO</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</header>
```

### 11.4 Feature Gating Pattern

```tsx
// FeatureGate component usage
<FeatureGate 
    feature="aiAssistantEnabled"
    fallback={<UpgradePrompt feature="AI Assistant" />}
>
    <AssistantPanel />
</FeatureGate>

// Hook-based gating
const { canUse, remaining } = useFeature('aiQueriesPerDay');
if (!canUse) {
    return <LimitReachedModal />;
}
```

### 11.5 Subscription Tiers (Planned)

| Feature | Free | Starter | Pro | Enterprise |
|---------|------|---------|-----|------------|
| Max Archives | 3 | 10 | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| AI Assistant | ❌ | 50/day | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Cloud Sync | ❌ | ❌ | ✅ | ✅ |
| Advanced Annotations | ❌ | ✅ | ✅ | ✅ |
| Custom Themes | ❌ | ❌ | ✅ | ✅ |
| Export Formats | PDF | PDF, EPUB | All | All |
| Priority Support | ❌ | ❌ | ❌ | ✅ |
